name: Fighting-game
tagline: A fighting game that a few high schoolers are working on.
body:
### Welcome to our fighting game Github page!

```
$ cd fighting-game/master
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
Sorry that this doesn't work currently!

### What is this project all about?
This project is all about testing our Java coding progress, and to pose a challenge to us. The game is a 2D fighting game, and we're utilizing the [Slick2D](http://slick.ninjacave.com/) library to make it a bit easier. We hope for it to be similar to other fighting games, such as street fighter, but this project is really about **learning**, _not_ creating a beautiful end project (that'd be nice, too). So, keep this in mind.

### Authors and Contributors
+ Jesse Deppisch - @JesseDeppisch
+ Mitchell Kaysen - @MitchellKaysen
+ Justin Cao 

### Support or Contact
You can contact Jesse Deppisch at jessedeppisch@gmail.com
